name: OneBit Demon Attack (Playdate)
description:
This is a little game inspired by Demon Attack the classic game for Atari 2600, Intellivision and others for the PlayDate console.  It is not intended to be a remake, nor a reboot of it and of course it is not endorsed by it in any way.

In this game you must defeat the different hordes of bio-mechanical demons until you face the final boss demon.

Game coded in LUA using PlayDate's SDK by Oscar BraindeaD

  • The ground draw routine was taken and adapted to PlayDate's LUA from a TIC-80 cart called MainFighter programmed by Niklas 'Nalquas' Freund. You can play it here: https://nalquas.itch.io/mainfighter
  • Sound effects was created with desktop version PICO-8
